entities.name: Key Performance Indicators
entities.description: Measurable values that demonstrate effectiveness in ecommerce.

attributes.definition: Regularly assessing your key performance indicators (KPI) is essential for meeting profit targets, remaining competitive, and growing your business.

entities.name: Ecommerce
entities.description: Business area focused on online buying and selling.

entities.name: Customer Data Platform
entities.description: System used to manage customer data for analytics.

entities.name: Cost per Click
entities.description: The amount spent on advertising divided by the number of clicks received.

attributes.definition: Cost per Click is a metric that measures the cost incurred for each click on an advertisement.

entities.name: Cost per Conversion
entities.description: The total cost of acquiring a customer divided by the number of conversions.

attributes.definition: Cost per Conversion measures the cost associated with converting a lead into a customer.

entities.name: Number of Leads
entities.description: The total number of potential customers who have shown interest in a product or service.

attributes.definition: Number of Leads refers to the count of individuals or businesses that have expressed interest in a company's offerings.

entities.name: Piwik PRO
entities.description: A platform for analyzing ecommerce KPIs.

entities.name: Ecommerce
entities.description: Business area focused on buying and selling goods and services online.

entities.name: Returning Visitors
entities.description: Metric that determines how many people have visited and returned to a website.

attributes.definition: Calculated by dividing the number of repeat visitors by the total number of unique visitors to your site in a given time period.

entities.name: Cart-to-Detail Rate
entities.description: Shows the ratio of cart additions to views of the product page.

attributes.formula: Number of unique products added to a cart / Number of times they have been visited

entities.name: Cart Abandonment Rate
entities.description: Measures the percentage of sessions that had an interaction with a cart but no order.

attributes.definition: Also known as the abandoned cart percentage KPI or the abandonment rate.

entities.name: Average Online Shopping Cart Abandonment Rate
entities.description: Average rate at which customers abandon their shopping carts.

entities.name: Site Search Usage
entities.description: Analyzes how visitors use the site’s search function.

attributes.definition: Includes the search terms they enter and the impact of the search results on engagement.

entities.name: Cart-to-Detail Rate Improvement
entities.description: Improvement in the cart-to-detail rate through better product information and user experience.

attributes.definition: Providing detailed product information can lead to a high cart-to-detail rate.

entities.name: Advertising Campaign Success
entities.description: Measures the success or performance of an advertising campaign.

attributes.definition: A Key Performance Indicator (KPI) that measures the success or performance of an advertising campaign.

entities.name: Ecommerce Key Performance Indicators
entities.description: Metrics used to evaluate the performance of ecommerce activities.

attributes.definition: KPIs that are specifically tailored for measuring ecommerce performance.

entities.name: Piwik PRO Funnel Reports
entities.description: Reports that track events in the ecommerce funnel.

entities.name: Shopping Behavior Report
entities.description: A funnel-based report that analyzes customer journey.

entities.name: Ecommerce
entities.description: Business area focused on online sales and marketing.

entities.name: Ecommerce Analytics
entities.description: Analytics focused on ecommerce performance and customer behavior.

entities.name: Customer Journey
entities.description: Data structure representing the stages of customer interaction.

entities.name: Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
entities.description: The total revenue a customer generates over their relationship with the company.

entities.name: Average Order Value by Channel
entities.description: The average revenue generated per order across different channels.

entities.name: Revenue per Visitor (RPV)
entities.description: The average revenue generated per visitor to the ecommerce site.

entities.name: Cart Abandonment Rate
entities.description: The percentage of shopping carts that are abandoned before completing a purchase.

entities.name: ecommerce_metrics
entities.description: Table containing various ecommerce key performance indicators.

entities.name: traffic_source
entities.description: Source of traffic to the ecommerce site.

entities.name: organic_traffic_sessions
entities.description: Number of sessions generated from organic traffic.

entities.name: click_through_rate
entities.description: Rate at which users click on a link compared to the number of times it is shown.

entities.name: Ecommerce
entities.description: Business area focused on online retail and sales.

entities.name: Orders New vs. Returning
entities.description: Tracking the ratio of orders from new and returning customers to gauge marketing success.

attributes.definition: Essential to gauge the success of marketing efforts and loyalty programs.

entities.name: Average Order Value (AOV)
entities.description: The average value of each order placed through a specific channel over a set period.

attributes.definition: Calculated by dividing the revenue by the number of orders.

entities.name: Revenue by Product
entities.description: The percentage of total revenue generated by a particular product.

attributes.definition: Helps identify products with the highest sales and their importance to the company.

entities.name: Average Order Value Calculation
entities.description: A metric that shows the average revenue per order.

entities.name: Ecommerce
entities.description: Business area focused on online buying and selling.

entities.name: Customer Support Chat
entities.description: Source of insights into customer intent and behavior.

entities.name: Traffic Source/Medium
entities.description: Indicates the starting point of website visitors, such as a search engine or specific domain.

attributes.definition: The source refers to the starting point of your website’s visitors, such as a search engine (for example, Google) or a specific domain.

entities.name: Organic Traffic Sessions
entities.description: Measures the number of sessions initiated by visitors coming from organic search results.

attributes.definition: This KPI provides valuable insight into user behavior by tracking the number of website visitors who found your link through a search engine result page rather than through paid ads.

entities.name: Ecommerce
entities.description: Business area focused on online buying and selling of goods.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. GA3 & GA4
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Google Analytics versions.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. Matomo
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Matomo.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. Adobe Analytics
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Adobe Analytics.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. AT Internet
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and AT Internet.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. Countly
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Countly.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. Amplitude
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Amplitude.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. Mixpanel
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Mixpanel.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. Snowplow
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Snowplow.

entities.name: Piwik PRO vs. Heap
entities.description: Comparison table between Piwik PRO and Heap.

entities.name: PP Tag Manager vs. GTM
entities.description: Comparison table between PP Tag Manager and Google Tag Manager.

entities.name: Web Analytics
entities.description: Domain related to web analytics tools and comparisons.

entities.name: Tag Management
entities.description: Domain related to tag management systems.

entities.name: Customer Data Platforms
entities.description: Domain related to customer data platform vendors.

entities.name: Consent Management
entities.description: Domain related to consent management practices.

entities.name: Conversion Tracking
entities.description: KPI related to tracking conversions in analytics.

entities.name: Remarketing
entities.description: KPI related to remarketing efforts in analytics.

entities.name: Keyword Performance
entities.description: Tracking the topics and search terms on your website that attract the most traffic.

attributes.definition: Helps understand the most relevant and high-impact keywords.

entities.name: Click-Through Rate (CTR)
entities.description: Measures the number of users who clicked a link compared to the number of impressions.

attributes.definition: Indicates how well content and marketing campaigns reach the target audience.

entities.name: Engagement Rate
entities.description: Evaluates the level of engagement with a product or content.

attributes.definition: A high engagement rate can lead to more clicks and conversions.

entities.name: Bounce Rate
entities.description: Percentage of people who enter a single page and leave without further action.

attributes.definition: Indicates the success of a single landing page.

entities.name: Bounce Rate Calculation
entities.description: Calculated measure of bounce rate.

attributes.formula: Bounce Rate = Single-Page Sessions / All Sessions

entities.description: Business area focusing on key performance indicators for ecommerce.
